name: TinyCheckboxGroup

fill.description: The fill color and border color of the checkbox in the form of a button
fill.description_zh: 按钮形式的 checkbox 激活时的填充色和边框色

:max.description: The maximum number of checkboxes that can be checked
:max.description_zh: 可被勾选的 checkbox 的最大数量

:min.description: The minimum number of checkboxes that can be checked
:min.description_zh: 可被勾选的 checkbox 的最小数量

size.description: The checkbox group size, which is only valid for checkboxes in the form of buttons or checkboxes with borders
size.description_zh: 多选框组尺寸，仅对按钮形式的 checkbox 或带有边框的 checkbox 有效

text-color.description: The color of the text when the checkbox in the form of a button is activated
text-color.description_zh: 按钮形式的 checkbox 激活时的文本颜色

type.description: The checkbox group child component type needs to be used in conjunction with the options property
type.description_zh: 复选框组子项组件类型，需配合 options 属性使用

vertical.description: Set how the components are arranged, and set whether the checkboxes are arranged vertically
vertical.description_zh: 设置组件排列方式，设置复选框是否垂直排列

events.name: change
events.description: An event that is triggered when a binding value changes
events.description_zh: 当绑定值变化时触发的事件

description: 用于配置不同场景的选项，提供用户可在一组选项中进行多选。
description_zh: 用于配置不同场景的选项，提供用户可在一组选项中进行多选。
